= Introduction =

Original author of tesseractTrainer.py Catalin Francu 
[http://groups.google.com/group/tesseract-ocr/browse_thread/thread/c4073cadb2acf820?pli=1 accounted on tesseract-ocr mailing list] she do not support tesseractTrainer.py anymore. For this reason new project was created to maintain this useful script. 

Name was changed to easy distinguish from project [http://www.mushware.com/ Tesseract Trainer].
